readable.title: 1313693129_71d0b21c63
readable.content: A boy and a girl are standing on a river bank facing the water . A boy and a slightly older girl stand on the shore of a small blue lake . A young woman and a young boy stand on the shore of a river . Two people , a boy in yellow and girl in brown , standing at the shore of a lake . Two people stand by the water 's edge .
